[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-jwk-consensus/src/mode/mod.rs] [Implementation: PerIssuerMode::session_key_from_qc] [Direct Clone] Does directly returning qc.update.issuer.clone() without validation allow duplicate or conflicting session keys if multiple QCs exist for the same issuer? (High)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-jwk-consensus/src/mode/mod.rs] [Implementation: PerKeyMode::session_key_from_qc] [Tuple Construction] Is the (issuer, kid) tuple constructed atomically, or can race conditions cause the tuple to contain mismatched issuer and kid from different updates? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/crates/aptos-jwk-consensus/src/mode/mod.rs] [Implementation: PerKeyMode] [DELETE Operation] Does the mode properly handle DELETE_COMMAND_INDICATOR in KeyLevelUpdate translation, or can it be confused with legitimate key data causing incorrect consensus operations? (High)
